content: Is this a known issue?: https://doc.rust-lang.org/nightly/nightly-rustc/rustc_typeck/impl_wf_check/min_specialization/fn.get_impl_substs.html, specifically the highlighting at the bottom
@oliver it looks like the code block isn't surrounded by backticks: https://doc.rust-lang.org/nightly/nightly-rustc/src/rustc_typeck/impl_wf_check/min_specialization.rs.html#149
it would be an easy fix if you want to make a PR :)
yeah I can slap something together, it really mangles the formatting: https://doc.rust-lang.org/nightly/nightly-rustc/rustc_typeck/impl_wf_check/min_specialization/fn.check_duplicate_params.html
